name: farm4me_api
description: this is the api serve served with cloud functions

scripts.set:env: test -f env.json && firebase functions:config:unset farm4me && firebase functions:config:set farm4me="$(cat env.json)" || echo "Please add the file env.json before deploy."
scripts.dev:env: npm run set:env && npm run set:dev:env
scripts.serve: npm run build:functions && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.serve:dev: nodemon --watch firebaseFunctions --watch package.json --watch env.json --watch .eslintrc --exec npm run serve
scripts.postbuild: npm run set:env && cd functions && npm i -s
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions
